title: Outlook client support in Microsoft365R available for beta test
summary: by Hong Ooi This is an announcement that a beta Outlook email client is now part of the Microsoft365R package. You can install it from the GitHub repository with: devtools::install_github("Azure/Microsoft365R") The client provides the following features: Send, reply to and forward emails, optionally composed with blastula or emayili Copy and move emails between folders Create, delete, copy and move folders Add, remove and download attachments The plan is to submit this to CRAN sometime next month, after a period of public testing. Please give it a try and give me your feedback: either via email or by opening an issue...
